briefTitle: Persistent Pain After Breast Cancer Treatment With Docetaxel
officialTitle: Persistent Pain After Breast Cancer Treatment With Docetaxel
conditions: Breast Neoplasms, Pain, Postoperative, Neuralgia, Lymphedema
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Docetaxel as a risk factor for development of persistent pain
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Treated for primary breast cancer in Denmark 2007-2008
* Age between 18-80 years
* No recurrent cancer
* Female

Exclusion Criteria:

* Previous breast surgery same side (including plastic and reconstructive surgery)
* Bilateral breast surgery
* Recurrent cancer or metastatic cancer
